summary: Water quality is stable but pH is slightly below optimal range for tilapia.

insights.recommendation: Consider adding a pH buffer to raise pH closer to 7.5 for optimal tilapia health.
Monitor TDS levels; consider water changes if TDS approaches 400 ppm.
Maintain temperature around 28-30°C for optimal growth of tilapia and plants.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.049 / 7.024 / 7.08 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 308.145 / 295.1 / 347.6 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 28.792 / 27.25 / 30.06 °C (trend: up)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
